name: Cellular (maoap)
description:
Cellular is a relaxing simulation game..

At the beginning, there are 500 000 cells for your disposal. They are looking for food and during their movement, they are emitting enzymes, so other cells can know that they are near the others. Once they gather food, they start to emit another enzyme and carry this food into the center of their home cluster. After they carry this food to their home, they die.

Press TAB and play with different settings, the best visual results are when you change those settings on the fly.

POST - GAME JAM version (the same one, but can be run on lower hardware):
https://maoap.itch.io/cellular-optimized
